mapper.select: SELECT c.challenge_id AS challengeId, c.title, c.description, DATE_FORMAT(c.starts_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS startDate, DATE_FORMAT(c.ends_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS endDate FROM challenges c ORDER BY c.starts_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO challenges (title, description, budget_limit, period_days, starts_at, ends_at, status) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{budgetLimit}, #{periodDays}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, 'UPCOMING')
